main event: A bright blue-green ball of light was observed in the sky by experienced pilots over Haines, Alaska.
interesting points: The object was described as having no tail or exhaust emissions.,It gradually disappeared from view.,The course of the object was observed at 255 degrees.,The sighting was reported by military personnel.,There is a similarity to other reports of blue-green objects traveling at high speeds.
sighted object: a bright blue-green ball of light
witness description: experienced pilots, one of whom is a former Air Force officer
